phrase.text: You fight well, young Iberian. A pity that our leader, Larax, is not here. He has been captured by the Romans and deported to an island called "Atlantis".
Now that I think about it... You could go looking for the mighty Larax! Undoubtedly, he would be of great help in your battle against the Romans!
Just capture the shipyard west of here. From there, you can buy a ship and go in search of Larax. Please, do as I say, warrior. Gaul begs you!
